summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image displays a description of a spell called "Azure Dust" from a video game. The spell allows the user to transform into a "rock guai," which is robust and immune to all Four Banes. Additionally, it gains Might when hit. The interface includes a prompt to confirm the selection.
embedding_prompt: The image displays a description of a spell called "Azure Dust" from a video game. The spell allows the user to transform into a "rock guai," which is robust and immune to all Four Banes. Additionally, it gains Might when hit. The interface includes a prompt to confirm the selection.
generate_prompt: This is an image from the file 'Azure_Dust.md', This is the 4th image in the document, The summary of this picture is:The image displays a description of a spell called "Azure Dust" from a video game. The spell allows the user to transform into a "rock guai," which is robust and immune to all Four Banes. Additionally, it gains Might when hit. The interface includes a prompt to confirm the selection.
